*div1 type="summary"* *p*Peter Ellis Bean to Austin, June 3, 1827. Announcing peace with Waco and Tahuacano chiefs.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Nacogdoches */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="06-03-1827">June the 3,—1827*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dear Sir*/p*
*p*I am happy to inform you that *date_mentioned n="06-02-1827">yesterday */date_mentioned*I have maid Pease with the *person_mentioned*Waco */person_mentioned**person_mentioned*Nesion */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*tawacanys */person_mentioned*also the *person_mentioned*chiefs of Both nasions */person_mentioned*is now in this Plase you can treat them as *person_mentioned*friends */person_mentioned*and can let your *location_mentioned*uper setelment*/location_mentioned* now it *date_mentioned n="06-04-1827">tomorrow */date_mentioned*I shall start with them to meet the *person_mentioned*Comanches */person_mentioned*and gow with them to *location_mentioned*Sn. Antonio*/location_mentioned* to settel all in this thare is nothing worth your notis to Right you all is quiot*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Peter E. Bean */person_mentioned* [Rubric*/p*] *p* [Addressed:] *person_mentioned*Sor Dn. Esteban F Austin*/person_mentioned*—en *location_mentioned*Sn fliipe—Brasos*/location_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
